  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

blocks.content: If the support of a function is a subset of the support of a finitely supported function, the function is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2019.)

  simpll(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)), wcel(c3, universe))

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c0)), wa(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))), wa(wcel(co(c2, csupp, c3), cfn), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3))))
  anim1i(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wss(co(c0, csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3)), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c3), cfn))
  fsuppimpd(c2, c3, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))

blocks.name: fsuppunfi
blocks.content: The union of the support of two finitely supported functions is finite. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppunfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c1))
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
  simpl2im(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wi(w0, wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn)), wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
  fsuppimp(c0, c1)
  com12(wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), w0, wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn))
  3syl(w0, wi(wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c1), wa(wfun(c2), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c1), cfn)))
  fsuppimp(c2, c1)
  adantl(wfun(c2), wcel(co(c2, csupp, c1), cfn), wi(wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn)))
  expcom(wcel(co(c2, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn), wcel(cun(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1)), cfn))
  unfi(co(c0, csupp, c1), co(c2, csupp, c1))
}

thm frnfsuppbi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wf(c4, c0, c5), wb(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cfn))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wb(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cfn)))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), cfn), wcel(co(c4, csupp, c2), cfn))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)), wb(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(c4, csupp, c2), cfn)), wfun(c4), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wfun(c4))
  ffun(c4, c0, c5)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c4, c0, c5), wcel(c4, universe))
  fex(c4, c0, c5, c1)
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wf(c4, c0, c5))
  funisfsupp(c4, universe, c2, c3)
  eleq1d(co(c4, csupp, c2), cfn, cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5)))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c0, c5), wceq(co(c4, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c4), cdif(c5, csn(c2)))))
  frnsuppeq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: fsuppmptif
blocks.content: A function mapping an argument to either a value of a finitely supported function or zero is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)

thm fsuppmptif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cfsupp, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cfsupp, c3), wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), csupp, c3), cfn))

  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), universe), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe), wcel(c3, c6))
  fvex(c2, cv(s0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c3, c6))
  ifexg(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe, c3, c6, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ssfid(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), csupp, c3), co(c2, csupp, c3), w0)
  fsuppimpd(c2, c3, w0)
  suppss2(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c3, co(c2, csupp, c3), c5, w0)
  syl6eq(cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c3, cif(c3, c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, co(c2, csupp, c3)))))
  ifeq1d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, co(c2, csupp, c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  suppssr(cv(s0), c0, co(c2, csupp, c3), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  ssidd(co(c2, csupp, c3), w0)
  ifid(c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cfsupp, c3), wa(wfun(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), csupp, c3), cfn))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), universe), wcel(c3, c6))
  mptexd(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c5, w0)
  isfsupp(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), universe, c3, c6)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, csupp, c3)

blocks.name: fsuppcolem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fsuppco . Formula building theorem for finite supports: rearranging the index set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)

thm fsuppcolem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c1, c3, c4))
} = {
  syl5eqel(cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn, cima(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), w0)
  eqtri(cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cima(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cima(ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))))
  imaeq1i(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2)), ccom(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0)))
  cnvco(c0, c1)
  imaco(ccnv(c1), ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), cfn), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn))
  syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  simprbi(wf1(c1, c3, c4), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf(c1, c3, c4))
  df-f1(c1, c3, c4)
  imafi(ccnv(c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))))
}

blocks.name: fsuppco
blocks.content: The composition of a 1-1 function with a finitely supported function is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsuppco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfsupp, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cfn))
  eqeltrd(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cfn, cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(ccom(c0, c1)), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, c5))
  suppimacnv(ccom(c0, c1), universe, c2, c5)
  fsuppcolem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqeltrrd(cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2))), cfn, co(c0, csupp, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, csupp, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c2)))), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c5))
  suppimacnv(c0, c6, c2, c5)
  fsuppimpd(c0, c2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfsupp, c2), wcel(co(ccom(c0, c1), csupp, c2), cfn)), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wfun(c0), wfun(c1))
  syl(w0, wfun(c0), wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2))
  simpld(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c2), wfun(c0), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c2), cfn))
  fsuppimp(c0, c2)
  syl(w0, wfun(c1), wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  f1fun(c1, c3, c4)
  funco(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, c6), wfun(ccnv(c1)))
  syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf1(c1, c3, c4))
  simprbi(wf1(c1, c3, c4), wfun(ccnv(c1)), wf(c1, c3, c4))
  df-f1(c1, c3, c4)
  cofunex2g(c0, c6, c1)
  funisfsupp(ccom(c0, c1), universe, c2, c5)
}

This is not only a special case of ~ fsuppcor because it does not require that the "zero" is an element of the range of the finitely supported function. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)

} = {
  syl5eqbr(c0, cfsupp, c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c5))), w0)

  snfi(c5)

  iffalsed(c6, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c5)))), wceq(cv(s0), c5))
  neneqd(cv(s0), c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c5)))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, csn(c5))), wne(cv(s0), c5))

  funmpt(s0, c2, cif(c6, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c5)))

  diff.csn.s(s0, c5)
}
